entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Tisdale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:55 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
